rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious living room with Mediterranean decor, featuring large windows and a wheelchair accessible layout.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: An open dining area adjacent to the living space with Vastu-compliant orientation for prosperity.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped kitchen with modern appliances and ample counter space. Designed for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A compact servant's quarter integrated into the ground floor, ensuring privacy and ease of access.

openings.description: Large entryway with a wheelchair accessible ramp leading to the entrance. Vastu principles applied by orienting towards the auspicious south.
Generous windows for natural light with energy-efficient designs in accordance with local building norms and Vastu guidelines.
All interior doors designed to be wide enough for wheelchair access with smooth operation and compliance with safety standards.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed master bedroom with a private balcony and ample storage. The room is designed to be wheelchair accessible.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Wheelchair-accessible bathroom featuring safety grab bars, non-slip flooring, and Vastu-compliant placement for personal well-being.

openings.description: A wheelchair-accessible staircase with an accompanying elevator designed for easy transition between floors.
Private balcony providing a Mediterranean outlook. Designed with safety railings and accessible steps.
